blogPost.excerpt: Balance Checkout is the first self-serve checkout that accepts all B2B payment needs. From net term financing to invoicing to checks, your B2B customers can finally pay how they want - with just a few clicks.
blogPost.body: Balance Checkout is the first self-serve checkout that accepts all B2B payment needs. From net term financing to invoicing to checks, your B2B customers can finally pay how they want - with just a few clicks.
blogPost.title: Balance Checkout - The first B2B checkout
blogPost.author: Ben Lang

localize.description: Balance Checkoutは、B2Bのすべての決済ニーズに対応した初のセルフサービス型チェックアウトです。ネットタームファイナンスから請求書発行、小切手まで、B2Bのお客様は数回のクリックでお好きな方法でお支払いいただけます。
localize.tagline: 最初のB2Bチェックアウト

localize.description: Balance Checkout是第一个接受所有B2B支付需求的自助式结账。从净额融资到发票再到支票，您的B2B客户终于可以按他们想要的方式付款--只需点击几下。
Balance Checkout是第一個接受所有B2B支付需求的自助式結賬。從淨額融資到發票再到支票，您的B2B客戶終於可以按他們想要的方式付款--只需點擊幾下。
